body.name: GAZHOME Twin XL Bed Frame with 2 XL Storage Drawers, Platform Bed Frame with 2-Tier Headboard, Strong Metal Slat Support/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly/Space Saving
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🛌【PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS】: Dimension: 87”× 41.3”× 39.6”, Mattress for 39”× 80”. ❤️There is extra space on the headboard for many items. it is a must to keep your phone and glasses in reach.

🛌【STRONG & STURDY METAL FRAME】: The metal frame of this high-quality Bed Frame is made of selected steel. We provide the rubber strip pressed the slats to prevent noise. The steel bars are strong and sturdy, can hold heavy objects and has large load capacity up to 1200 lbs, you don’t need to worry about it getting crooked or even collapsing. The metal frame is also covered with anti-rust finish paint, making the service life even longer.

🛌【SIMPLE & STYLISH DESIGN】: This Bed Frame is widely loved for its rustic, natural and simple appearance and its strong and durable quality. It is perfect for all home decoration styles.The bottom of the bed frame is 10.5 inches high, and the large capacity can store home, books, etc.

🛌【EASY INSTALLATION WITH HARDWARE KIT】: No need to purchase extra hardware or tools for installing this bed frame, we have included a full installation hardware kit in the package for you, you can finish the installation all by yourself within half an hour! What’s more, there’s also a detailed installation manual that explains every step clearly, making your work much easier.

🛌【ABOUT SERVICE】:Our bed frames come in the same package, so you won't be bothered by receiving different packages on different dates! If you have any question about this Bed Frame, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you!GAZHOME Team always keep online.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Style Your Room 2-Tier High quality wood headboard Featuring MDF wood panels and high-quality stainless steel construction with a vintage wood pattern finish, this luxurious platform bed will add sophisticated style to any bedroom.
Save Your Room Bed Frame with 2 XL Storage Drawers The 2 storage drawers under the bed make good use of the space underneath, making the whole bedroom look very neat and protecting your privacy

Mute slat The mute buckle is used to fix the slats more firmly, which can prevent the noise caused movement. EVA Sponge The EVA material reduces the friction between the slats, which can prevent the noise and extend the life of the storage bed.

More You Want to Know Color Brown Weight Capacity 1200 LBS Install Required YES Upholstery Material Metal & Wood Twin XL Size 87"L x 41.3"W x 39.6"H Twin Size 82"L x 41.3"W x 39.6"H Full Size 82"L x 56.3"W x 39.6"H Queen Size 87"L x 62.6"W x 39.6"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy - extra supportive with metal slats (no box-spring needed)
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bed that doesn't require box spring. It comes in reasonably small box that can fit in the backseat of the car. You will need to do full assembly which is not hard but I suggest not to tighten up the screws right away. Install everything then go back and tighten all the screws. The setup has a high-quality metal frame and steel bars that can hold much weight without losing shape or collapsing. In addition to symmetrically aligned slat spacers, rubber strips are pressed between the slats that prevent regular creaking of the bed while shifting weight over them or during movement.The metal frame is finished with anti-rust paint to ensure its longer life. Optimum under-bed space facilitates storage options and adds to its user-friendliness. The rustic style of the frame makes it suitable for all kinds of homes. Ample space underneath the bed is great for storage bins and such. We needed a bedframe for our guestroom to accommodate guests and friends of my kids during their overnight stays. We opted for this one because of its simple design and rustic appeal that went with other furniture in the room. It was easy to install and even provided ample bottom storage space where I could store the curtains and bathroom linen. We are extremely satisfied with the bedframe. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a budget friendly bed and this bed did not disappoint. Its well made, the parts weren't bet or damaged. The bed doesn't look cheap. Its very strong! My husband and i have laid on it at the same time with both of our toddlers and its held up! One important thing, the bed doesn't squeak! The only “hard” part is building it because you actually have to follow the booklet instructions and they're not very good but with a little patience its doable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to put together very sturdy bed looks very nice in the room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent for the money.
reviews.reviewText: If you're on a tight budget and need a bedframe quickly, this isn't a bad choice. It's fairly sturdy, doesn't creek, and from what I can tell, won't damage (tear, cut, or poke holes in) your mattress (from sharp edges or bad welds). That being said, you should take care not to strip the bolt heads - that will leave sharp burrs that will probably tear into your mattress and sheets.If you're assembling this by yourself, follow my tips in the photos I included. You'll find it much easier than the way the instructions direct you. Also, as another savy reviewer mentioned, leave all the bolts somewhat loose until you have everything in-place. Some parts may not fit until you go back and loosen a bunch of other parts.I prefer solid oak furniture, but in a pinch (and on a tight budget) , I feel I got a good value for what I paid and will recommend this product to friends.Some other reviewers seem to have received bent and damaged versions of this product. Thankfully this wasn't the case with mine. Since this bedframe is all steel, it's pretty darn heavy. It wouldn't surprise me if a lazy or careless delivery driver dropped, or otherwise mishandled the package leading to bent parts. I was lucky enough to not have had that happen.Lastly, something only (one other reviewer) accurately pointed out, the under-bed clearance (for storage) is 10 and 1/4 inches! NOT the 11 inches the description claims! Also, if you're buying one of those under-bed rolling drawr type, wire basket, storage things, and you want one that fits almost exactly under the 10&1/4 inches, you only have 19&3/4 inches of clearance until you hit the middle of the bedframe center support which drops down to 9 inches. Bare that in mind if you want something that slides deeper under the bed.One last and only minor flaw, the center leg on the rail, between headboard and footboard, is flush with the rail, making you prone to painfully stubbing your toes on it! I did it twice so far. It should have been designed (inset) or further under the bed to prevent such an incident. Oh well, for this low price, you can't expect everything.For the most part, I'm happy with this bedframe and would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kids bed
reviews.reviewText: We got these beds for our 9 and 6 year old girls. They like the design of the bed "it's really pretty ". We live the underbed storage, on lu thing to gwt used to is the pullout drawers are not on a track and easily tip. Consider adding a weight to the back to balance them. The headboard is really nice to add night light and place for trinket display. We are considering adding some fun lights to the bed which will be easy to hide under shelving.This bed is also great for growth as it seems pretty timeless in design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bed itself is fine and pretty sturdy but the "drawers" are just flimsy wire baskets on wheels with a matching wood front piece that happen to fit under the bed. There are no tracks or anything to guide them. Skip the model with the "drawers" and buy some plastic underbed storage boxes instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter and she helped me put it together so it was pretty easy. Clear instructions and no missing pieces or hardware. I watched the reviews before purchasing and noticed a few people had problems with the bars bending although we have not had that issue. My daughter is an adult and has been sleeping on this bed for several months now with no issues with the bars bending. She loves her new bed! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice and seems sturdy but definitely not the greatest quality “wood”. One screw already pulled out bit doesn’t impact the function of the drawers.
